001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.io.PrintWriter;
004import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
005
006/** Bach's main program. */
007public record Main() implements ToolProvider {
008
009  /** The main entry-point. */
010  public static void main(String... args) {
011    var options = args.length == 0 ? Options.parse("--help") : Options.parse(args);
012    var out = new PrintWriter(System.out, true);
013    var err = new PrintWriter(System.err, true);
014    try (var program = new Program(out, err, options)) {
015      program.run();
016    }
017  }
018
019  @Override
020  public String name() {
021    return "bach";
022  }
023
024  @Override
025  public int run(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, String... args) {
026    try (var program = new Program(out, err, Options.parse(args))) {
027      program.run();
028      return 0;
029    } catch (Exception exception) {
030      err.println(exception);
031      return 1;
032    }
033  }
034
035  record Program(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, Options options) implements AutoCloseable {
036
037    public void run() {
038      var main = options.forMain();
039      if (main.help().orElse(false)) {
040        out.print(
041            """
042            Usage: bach OPTION [ARGUMENTS...]
043            Options include:
044              --help, /?
045                Print this help message.
046              --list-tools
047                Print provided tools and exit.
048              --run-tool NAME ARGUMENTS...
049                Find first tool provider by its NAME and run it with the given ARGUMENTS.
050              --show-tools
051                Print provided tools and continue.
052              --version
053                Print Bach's version and exit.
054            """);
055        return;
056      }
057      Bach bach = null; // create lazily and memoize locally
058      if (main.listTools().orElse(false) || main.showTools().orElse(false)) {
059        bach = new Bach();
060        bach.printer().printTools();
061        if (main.listTools().orElse(false)) return;
062      }
063      if (main.version().orElse(false)) {
064        out.println(Bach.version());
065        return;
066      }
067      var unhandled = options.unhandledArguments();
068      if (main.runTool().isPresent()) {
069        if (bach == null) bach = new Bach();
070        var tool = main.runTool().get();
071        var command = Command.of(tool).addAll(unhandled);
072        var run = bach.run(command);
073        bach.printer().print(run, true, 0);
074        return;
075      }
076      if (unhandled.isEmpty()) {
077        throw new AssertionError("Something bad went wrong: %s".formatted(options));
078      }
079      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(String.join(" ", unhandled));
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public void close() {
084      out.flush();
085      err.flush();
086    }
087  }
088}
